DOC.brief_summary: Observational cohort study child hospitalize acute bronchiolitis . Patients nursed cohort isolation . Aim investigate incidence clinical impact co-infections group .
DOC.detailed_description: Observational cohort study child hospitalize acute bronchiolitis . Patients nursed cohort isolation , mean patient admit bronchiolitis cohorted together , irrespective viral diagnosis . Aim investigate incidence clinical impact co-infections group .
DOC.criteria: young 2 year admit bronchiolitis chronic lung disease congenital heart defect syndrome
